00019 // macro for converting from one type to another regardless of type
00020 #define CONVERT switch(*(type+index)){\
00021                         case kTypeInt8:\
00022                                 value = (data+index)->int8;\
00023                                 break;\
00024                         case kTypeUInt8:\
00025                                 value = (data+index)->uint8;\
00026                                 break;\
00027                         case kTypeInt16:\
00028                                 value = (data+index)->int16;\
00029                                 break;\
00030                         case kTypeUInt16:\
00031                                 value = (data+index)->uint16;\
00032                                 break;\
00033                         case kTypeFloat32:\
00034                                 value = (data+index)->float32;\
00035                                 break;\
00036                         case kTypeFloat64:\
00037                                 value = (data+index)->float64;\
00038                                 break;\
00039                         case kTypeInt32:\
00040                                 value = (data+index)->int32;\
00041                                 break;\
00042                         case kTypeUInt32:\
00043                                 value = (data+index)->uint32;\
00044                                 break;\
00045                         case kTypeInt64:\
00046                                 value = (data+index)->int64;\
00047                                 break;\
00048                         case kTypeUInt64:\
00049                                 value = (data+index)->uint64;\
00050                                 break;\
00051                         case kTypeBoolean:\
00052                                 value = (data+index)->boolean;\
00053                                 break;\
00054                         default:\
00055                                 value = -1;\
00056                                 break;\
00057                 }

00069 class TTValue : TTElement {
00070 private:
00071         union DataValue{
00072                 TTFloat32               float32;
00073                 TTFloat64               float64;
00074                 TTInt8                  int8;
00075                 TTUInt8                 uint8;
00076                 TTInt16                 int16;
00077                 TTUInt16                uint16;
00078                 TTInt32                 int32;
00079                 TTUInt32                uint32;
00080                 TTInt64                 int64;
00081                 TTUInt64                uint64;
00082                 TTBoolean               boolean;
00083                 TTSymbol                *sym;
00084                 TTObject                *object;
00085         };
00086

00088         DataValue       *data;                  
00089         TTUInt16        numValues;

00214         // make sure this is a friend so that it can access the private members of the other atom
00215         friend bool operator == (const TTValue &a1, const TTValue &a2)
00216         {
00217                 short   i;
00218 
00219                 if(a1.numValues != a2.numValues)
00220                         return false;
00221 
00222                 for(i=0; i < a1.numValues; i++){
00223                         if(a1.type[i] != a2.type[i])
00224                                 return false;
00225                         else{
00226                                 switch(a1.type[i]){
00227                                         case kTypeInt8:
00228                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->int8 == (a1.data+i)->int8 )
00229                                                         return false;
00230                                         case kTypeUInt8:
00231                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->uint8 == (a1.data+i)->uint8 )
00232                                                         return false;
00233                                         case kTypeInt16:
00234                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->int16 == (a1.data+i)->int16 )
00235                                                         return false;
00236                                         case kTypeUInt16:
00237                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->uint16 == (a1.data+i)->uint16 )
00238                                                         return false;
00239                                         case kTypeInt32:
00240                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->int32 == (a1.data+i)->int32 )
00241                                                         return false;
00242                                         case kTypeUInt32:
00243                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->uint32 == (a1.data+i)->uint32 )
00244                                                         return false;
00245                                         case kTypeInt64:
00246                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->int64 == (a1.data+i)->int64 )
00247                                                         return false;
00248                                         case kTypeUInt64:
00249                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->uint64 == (a1.data+i)->uint64 )
00250                                                         return false;
00251                                         case kTypeFloat32:
00252                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->float32 == (a1.data+i)->float32 )
00253                                                         return false;
00254                                         case kTypeFloat64:
00255                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->float64 == (a1.data+i)->float64 )
00256                                                         return false;
00257                                         case kTypeBoolean:
00258                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->boolean == (a1.data+i)->boolean )
00259                                                         return false;
00260                                         case kTypeSymbol:
00261                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->sym == (a1.data+i)->sym )
00262                                                         return false;
00263                                         case kTypeObject:
00264                                                 if( (a1.data+i)->object == (a1.data+i)->object )
00265                                                         return false;
00266                                         default:
00267                                                 return false;
00268                                 }
00269                         }
00270                 }
00271                 return true;
00272         }
00273 };
